review: Excellent diagnostic centre....*** ****** ** ********* ************* *** very dedicated.He truly cares for the patient and also as an individual.Really impressed..would recommend my friends...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very patient and ************* impressed with his care   ,listens to patient intently and in detail. Explains the problem well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Consulted the doctor for gastritis. Doctor was in a complete hurry. He didn't care to look at the health reports I had given him. Didn't give even few seconds of time to explain my GI related problems that I was facing. He just jumped at conclusion that it was stomach pain and it should probably be hernia and that I need to be on life long medication. I stopped him to say that it wasn't hernia and I had a test done ** ******* ********* ** ***** ** ****** ** ** *** said that test has to be done only where he recommends to be taken. No value for the time and money spent on consultation. Wouldn't recommend to anyone.
reply_text: Worst patient I have seen, has fixed ideas and has no patience to listen! Wants treatment for whatever he thinks is his diagnosis!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: keenly listened to my history and then explained the problem without unnecessary tests! well read and friendly doctor!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Good great and well experienced
Visited the doctor for abdominal pain
Now reduced and feeling better
Thanks

tags: None
review: I have taken a single consultation from him. He prescribed some medications ***** ****** ****** **** *** *** He has informed me to go for a follow up if the problems still persist. But I am satisfied with the results as of now. There was around half an hour of a waiting period. Everything was good and comfortable during the consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Ganesh patiently listened to the problems and provided remedy for it, he didn't unnecessarily ask for scan and other diagnostic. He advised endoscopy only when the pain is not re-mediated after tablets.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor understood my problem and gave hope for recovery and asked me to visit for further assistance.
